attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Goverment has done a good job over the last few years of ruining sport in this country at grass root level by taking money and facilities away,and now they want to host the biggest sporting event on the planet. To help fund this they want to take away lottery money from causes that need it most and also make the hard working people of London pay for it. This is an absolute disgrace..Gordon Brown do what is right and give the Olympics to Paris.
